about_the_game:
Trapped, Alone and long away from real world, a man must make his way through dangerous places to find a way out.

Deathwish is a top-down, single-player game power by UNREAL ENGINE 5 and developed by two developers

A man who has been time traveled by mysterious stone is trapped in medieval ages and have to find the stone in this age to get back to his real world
Along the way the man will face a lot of enemies and a lot more traps.

Run ,fight enemies, avoid the traps , solve riddles , choose the right path and think twice before it, because there is no more than one right path, find weapon if you need your way to be easier.
The game will take you on a medieval adventure with different environment in each level.
There is a big challenge playing Deathwish, the traps are unpredictable and one hit will get you killed, you have to be cautious and patient to beat the game.



MODES:-
-Story Mode
-Endless Running Mode

content_descriptors.notes: The game may include little violence which is not proper for kids

detailed_description:
Trapped, Alone and long away from real world, a man must make his way through dangerous places to find a way out.

Deathwish is a top-down, single-player game power by UNREAL ENGINE 5 and developed by two developers

A man who has been time traveled by mysterious stone is trapped in medieval ages and have to find the stone in this age to get back to his real world
Along the way the man will face a lot of enemies and a lot more traps.

Run ,fight enemies, avoid the traps , solve riddles , choose the right path and think twice before it, because there is no more than one right path, find weapon if you need your way to be easier.
The game will take you on a medieval adventure with different environment in each level.
There is a big challenge playing Deathwish, the traps are unpredictable and one hit will get you killed, you have to be cautious and patient to beat the game.

name: Deathwish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit Windows
  • Processor: 2Ghz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT or Radeon HD 2900XT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit Windows
  • Processor: Core i5 Gen10 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 or Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
